name: appointmentCheck1
description: get appointmentId, appointmentDateTime, vehicleID, and reasons.

sampleUtterances.utterance: I would like to check my appointment details.
I would like to check the date of my appointment.
I would like to check what is the store ID.
What is the vehicle ID of the appointment

plainTextMessage.value: Are you sure this is your appointment number?
Okay. Your request to check your appointment has been canceled. You may ask other questions if you please.
Your appointment is on October 21, 2021 at 6:00pm. See you then!
